name: Je suis Rock
author: Thomas OUEDRAOGO

sections.description: A ribbon with the words “#JeSuisRock” will be put on in the top right or left (contains 2 plugin files) corner of your website, linking to the Facebook Page(https://www.facebook.com/pages/Roch-Marc-Christian-Kabor%C3%A9/674710549328565). Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Thank you for showing your support.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip archive.
  2. Extract it in your wp-content/plugins folder or upload via admin panel.
  3. Browse to your plugins section and active the plugin you need (left or right side, with not both, you see).

short_description: Because of Burkina Faso 2015 presidential run, you can show your support to Rock Marc Christian KABORE by putting the ribbon "#JeSuisRock"   …
description: A ribbon with the words “#JeSuisRock” will be put on in the top right or left (contains 2 plugin files) corner of your website, linking to the Facebook Page(https://www.facebook.com/pages/Roch-Marc-Christian-Kabor%C3%A9/674710549328565). Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Thank you for showing your support.
